chat_history.message:
Hello, My iPhone 12 mini is having an issue as follows: The delivery address hasn't been complete that's 7 BIS ALLEE PASTEUR and the rest of the address is CAZAUX 33260 LA TESTE DE BUCH unless it won't happen that's because it's for a birthday on Saturday that's why I had to pay extra that's too bad we can't get a relay. Thank you.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the updated address.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

7 BIS ALLEE PASTEUR CAZAUX 
33260 LA TESTE DE BUCH

The customer paid a surcharge for express delivery for this they need the device Saturday for a birthday.

Can you give us the right follow up because the one you sent does not work.

Rosario,
Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

The order has already been shipped and is on its way to the customer. Attached is the tracking link for the customer's reference. 

https://www.chronopost.fr/tracking-no-cms/suivi-page?listeNumerosLT=GH202902958JB&langue=fr_FR

Regards,
TB

Dear Backcare,

The device has been delivered to the customer according to the tracking link provided. If the customer does not require any further assistance, please close the case. Thank you.

Regards,
TB
